available_services.name: WEBP To PNG
available_services.description: WEBP is a modern image format that provides superior lossless and lossy compression for images on the web. PNG is a lossless image format that supports transparency and is widely used for web graphics.

available_services.name: BMP To PNG
available_services.description: BMP is a raster graphics image file format used to store bitmap digital images. PNG is a lossless image format that supports transparency and is widely used for web graphics.

available_services.name: JPG To PNG
